title: Boxed Wine - "Cheap, Fun EP"

Short bio: 

Boxed Wine is an indie pop band from New Jersey that formed in late 2011. After getting a solid lineup together, they quickly released a self-titled EP and started referring to themselves in the third person. It took the band a while to come up with a name as meaningful as Boxed Wine, but they believe it says everything it should. The groupÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s influences are quite varied, but they generally love mixing pop structures with fuzzy bass and disco beats. Ultimately, their goal is to make music that anybody can enjoy and hopefully dance to.
